scotland.caption: The highlands remember what the cities forgot.

britain.caption: Rule Britannia? More like Rule by Algorithm.

europe.caption: United in diversity. Divided in reality.

ai.caption: We built gods and gave them agendas. Now they're optimizing us out of existence.
The singularity won't be televised. It'll be streamed with targeted ads.

global.caption: Civilization 2.0: Now with 100% more existential dread.
